entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 19
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH 10 TO 15 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 15 TO 20
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
